rows.label: qev080401_MSG0001
rows.name:
I haven't seen Mother around lately.
Have you heard anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Don't tell me she got on your nerves so much you had
her scrapped![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_JNK0010
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev080401_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you would never do that to Erio's mother.

rows.label: qev080401_JNK0020
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev080401_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say that the temptation has been
there on multiple occasions.

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0003
rows.name: You're as kind and patient as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0004
rows.name:
But I challenge anyone on the planet to listen to her for
an hour and not go homicidal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Any sane person subjected to that hubris would want to
bring her down a peg. ...Or 10.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0006
rows.name: Believe me, I understand the impulse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Even after Professor B's little attitude adjustment,
she maintains the personality of an overgrown child.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Just thinking about how that thing gave birth to my
sisters and me is enough to split my head.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Jokes aside, the fact that you haven't heard anything
makes me even more concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0010
rows.name:
She can't give orders directly to my sisters anymore,
but there are still plenty of people who would listen.
Or worship her, even.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Lately I've seen her speaking with a Definian named
Lyvia an awful lot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0012
rows.name: Do you think I could ask you to track Mother down?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0013
rows.name:
If she HAS run off, I'm certain there's a whole
unpleasant plot behind it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0014
rows.name:
I feel like I only ever bring trouble to your doorstep,
but know that I appreciate your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0015
rows.name:
I suppose it makes sense to look for Lyvia first,
since she's the Definian who Mother was contacting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0016
rows.name:
I assume she is still in New LA, but...
Well, she's a Definian. She'll be disguised as a human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0017
rows.name:
I guess there's nothing for it save to ask around,
track her down whenever she decides to show herself,
and press her for what she knows about Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0018
rows.name:
A Definian called Lyvia was coming to see Mother fairly
frequently in the days leading up to her disappearance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0019
rows.name:
When I asked Mother about it, she said that Lyvia was
coming to her for advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thinking back on it, it was ridiculous to think that self-
serving sphere would help anyone without a payoff.
Something was up between them. I'm sure of it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Please, uncover Lyvia's disguise here in town and ask
what she knows about Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0022
rows.name:
There are a lot of eyes in this cityâ€”someone must have
seen something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0023
rows.name: ...She's in Rooney Cavern in Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I have a bad feeling about this. Please, you must bring
Mother back here as quickly as you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'll head out and meet up with you there as soon as my
own preparations are complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0026
rows.name: I have a question for you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Heh heh. You have a look on your face like
"Um...do I know you?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0028
rows.name: It's me! Erio! ...The Definian?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080401_MSG0029
rows.name:
This is the form I took to live in New LA.
I've really been enjoying it, honestly.[ST:wait ]
